channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Liz Cheney endorses pair of Democrats in key House races
item.description: Former Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney endorsed a pair of Democrats in races that could determine who wins the House majority in November.
